apihelp-visualeditor-param-basetimestamp: Gin yer savin, mak this the timestamp o the revision chynged. It's uised tae airt oot ony fechts wi chynges.
tooltip-ca-createsource: Cræft the soorce code o this page
tooltip-ca-editsource: Eedit the soorce code o this page
visualeditor-beta-warning: VeesualEeditor is in 'beta'. Ye micht encoonter saffware eessues, n ye michtna be able tae eedit pairts o the page. Tae switch back tae soorce eeditin at onie time wioot tintin yer chynges, apen the drapdown neix tae "{{int:visualeditor-toolbar-savedialog}}" n select "{{int:visualeditor-mweditmodesource-tool}}".
visualeditor-browserwarning: Ye'r uisin ae brouser that's na offeeciallie supportit bi VeesualEediter.
visualeditor-dialog-beta-welcome-content: This is oor new, easier waa tae eedit. It's still in beta, this means that ye micht fynd pairts o the page that ye canna chynge, or encoonter issues that need tae be fixt. We encoorage ye tae luikower yer chynges, and we weelcome reports aneat ony issues that ye micht encoonter in uisin VisualEditor (clap the "{{int:visualeditor-help-tool}}" button tae haun feedback in). Ye can mak uise o' the wikitext eediter at ony time bi clapin oan the "$1" tab, and ony chynges will be keepit.
visualeditor-dialog-media-alttext-sectio: Ye can uise this tae gie a text description, uisit by folk that cannae see the item. The description shuld be enew fer them tae unnerstaund the uise fer and infermation gien by the media item. This is necessar fer the blin and ithers uisin screen-readers or text-ainly broosers.
visualeditor-dialog-media-content-sectio: Ye can uise this tae shaw a label that shaw nextae the item fer aw readers. This is aften uised tae expleen how the item is uiseful tae the context it's shawn in. It shud be uiseful but gang shairt.
visualeditor-dialog-media-position-check: Ye can mak this media item shaw inlin wi the text o the page in stead o flaitin. Ye shud ainly dae this seendle, syne it will brak up the flowe o the text gin ye unpick this box.
visualeditor-dialog-media-position-secti: Ye can pick whaur this media item shaws on the page. This is bytimes uisit tae brak up a lang line o eemages fae ane side o the page.
visualeditor-dialog-meta-categories-defa: Sort this page bi defaut aes
visualeditor-dialog-meta-categories-hidd: This categerie isna set tae shaw oan pages whaur it's added til.
visualeditor-dialog-meta-categories-sort: Sort this page aes gif it's cawed
visualeditor-dialog-meta-languages-reado: This is ae leet o pages in ither leids that ar linkt til this page. Fer the nou, it can yinlie be eeditit in soorce mode or oan Wikidata.
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-index-: Let this page be indeix't bi rake engines
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-newsec: Shaw ae tab oan this page tae eik ae new section
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-nocont: Dinna convert content atween leid variants
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-noedit: Disable the eedit links nex til ilka heidin oan this page.
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-notitl: Dinna convert title atween leid variants
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-redire: Stap this reguidal fae bein updatit whan tairget page is muived.
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-toc-he: Ye can gar a table o conteents wi a leet o each heidin on the page tae shaw on pages wi less than three heidins, or nae at aw. For ordinar, it will shaw gin the page his three or mair heidins.
visualeditor-dialog-reference-editing-re: This soorce is uisit $1 {{PLURAL:$1|times}} on this page.
visualeditor-dialog-reference-useexistin: Re-uise a soorce fae anither part o this page
visualeditor-dialog-transclusion-no-temp: {{GENDER:$3|Ye'r eikin}} the "$1" template tae this page. It disna hae ae descreeption yet, but thaur micht be some information oan the template's page.
visualeditor-dialog-transclusion-require: Ye shuir ye wantae conteena wi nae fillin the $1 {{PLURAL:$2|parameter|parameters}}?
visualeditor-diff-nochanges: Coudna stairt the liukower cause yer luikower matches the latest version o this page.
visualeditor-editconflict: Yer chynges coudna be hained cause o aen eedit conflict. Woud {{GENDER:|ye}} like tae resolve the conflict manuallie?
visualeditor-loadwarning: Mistak laidin ddata fae server:$1 Wid ye like tae gie it anither gae?
visualeditor-loadwarning-token: Mistak laidin eedit token fae server:$1 Wid ye like tae gie it anither gae?
visualeditor-mweditmodesource-warning:
Ye'r aboot tae switch til soorce eeditin.
Onie chynges that ye'v duin tae this document wil be kept, bit ye'l no be able switch back tae VeesualEediter wioot hainin or relaidin the page.
Dae ye want tae conteenu?
visualeditor-pagetranslationwarning: Ye'r eeditin aen owersetable page. Eeditin thir in VeesualEediter isna yet offeeciallie supported.
visualeditor-preference-betatempdisable: Tempralie diable VeesualEediter while it's still in beta
visualeditor-preference-core-description: Enable VeesualEediter. It will na be available oan tauk pages n some ither namespaces.
visualeditor-preference-enable: Enable the VeesualEediter. It will be available in the follaein {{PLURAL:$2|namespace|namespaces}}: $1
visualeditor-recreate: The page his been deletit synce ye startit makin chynges. Clap "$1" tae mak it again.
visualeditor-referenceslist-isempty: Thaur's nae referances wi the groop "$1" oan this page tae incluid in this leet.
visualeditor-referenceslist-isempty-defa: Thaur's nae referances oan this page tae incluid in this leet.
visualeditor-referenceslist-missingref: This referance is defined in ae template or ither generatit block, n fer nou can yinlie be eeditit in soorce mode.
visualeditor-savedialog-error-badtoken: We coudna process yer eedit cause the session wis nae langer valid.
visualeditor-savedialog-identify-anon: Dae ye want tae hain this page aes aen anonimis uiser in steid? Yer IP address will be recordit in this page's eedit histerie.
visualeditor-savedialog-identify-user: Ye'r nou loggit in aes [[User:$1|$1]]. Yer eedit will be associatit wi this accoont gif ye hain this eedit.
visualeditor-savedialog-warning-dirty: Yer eedit micht hae been rotted - please luikower afore hainin.
visualeditor-saveerror-titleblacklist: Cannae save page: This page's title is blacklistit
visualeditor-timeout: It luiks lik this eediter is onavailable the nou; wid ye lik tae eedit in soorce mode insteid?
visualeditor-viewpage-savewarning: Ar ye sair that ye want tae gang back til see mode wioot hainin first?
visualeditor-wikitext-warning: Ye'r uisin VeesualEediter - [[{{MediaWiki:visualeditor-wikitext-warning-link}}|wikitext]] disna wairk here. Tae switch tae soorce eeditin at onie time wioot tintin yer chynges, apen the drapdoun menu nex tae "{{int:visualeditor-toolbar-savedialog}}" n clap oan "{{int:visualeditor-mweditmodesource-title}}".
